---

```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = F, message = F, warning = F)
library(tidyverse)
library(readxl)
library(leaflet)
```

```{r read_in_data}
provd = read_excel("data/Communications Coordination.xlsx", sheet = 'Provincial CDD Signs')

iscbcd = read_excel('data/Communications Coordination.xlsx', sheet = 'ISCBC CDD Signage Location')
```

```{r make_into_sf}
provd = provd |> 
  dplyr::filter(!is.na(latitude))

provd |> 
  dplyr::mutate(latitude = stringr::str_extract(latitude, ".*(?=(°)?)"),
                longitude = stringr::str_extract(longitude, ".*(?=(°)")) |> 
  dplyr::mutate(latitude = as.numeric(latitude),
                longitude = as.numeric(longitude))
```
